OnAdminGained.AddIRCMessage: !ANNOUNCEMENT! VORTEX JOINED THE SERVER @channel
Vortex? What a lame
We haven't talked for 2 months and that is how you greet me? Anyway, at least I must be grateful that it is not "I will bust your criminal ass right now"
I am really considering it now
Nevermind then. I am really glad to hear from you Clara
Cypher... please, explain anything
It was a masterpiece setup. I was hacked by that third hacker, Omicron, he gave me a very simple choice: being caught instantly, or a few days after. I changed IP and fled
Remember that last file I dropped? Drug traffic details? Well, it had a script in it
Giving all kind of access to the Emalio cartel, and placing my tracks all over the place of course
You have EnSec, how is that possible that you have been hacked and why I should believe you?
If you remember, guy had EnSec as well, and from what I can see, he is tied with EnTech one way or another
Just think about it, he had moles in DEA and CyberPolice. He knew when we are going to hit him, nothing stops him from injecting his men in EnTech, it is a huge money-thirsty monopolistic corporation
Cypher, FBI thinks that YOU were a mole on our side
Feds got the DEA guy, he confirmed you were cooperating with cartel
What?

And Omicron is dead by the way. Other squad disabled EnSec protocols with the help of EnTech digital enforcers and got inside his systems. He is shot by the cartel members, data leakage was on his Relay Server so they blamed him
No, it can't be, he is alive, he planned all of this, he disposed of the cartel that way, he is still out there and I am looking for him and I feel that I am getting closer
Captain, I really want to believe you, you made me see why I should devote myself to help people
But on the other hand your name brings me nothing but trouble for the last 2 months
I am sorry Clara
I never wanted to see my friends and family suffering because of me
All this injustice is has to be undone
It is now the only thing that motivates me
Justice?
Or revenge?
When you will find out, then we will talk again
Before you go, I have to ask you something
Can you slow down a little bit with your current investigation? I am undercover inside NightHawks group, and I have to complete a contract so they would give me info about Omicron
After that, I can give you them up on a silver platter
I am giving you one day. Tomorrow, these Spoofer idiots will be in custody
Thank you Clara. I hope we will make things right together
It depends on your actions, Captain...
!ANNOUNCEMENT! CHANNEL IS CLOSED @channel
